description:

Immediately, the antibody is discovered, and the ladies decide that their “dragons” should “fly,” bringing the antidote hard into his extensive intestinal tunnel in a most unconventional way.

First, they try to choke out the COVID with their infamous XL rubber dicks shoved deep into their patient’s throat. When that fails to work – and his temperature is still rising – he is immunized with an “ass-vaccination.” It is proven that the Coronavirus hides in the deepest corners of the asshole. After a long struggle with the still-present virus, they then dig in, up to their elbows, in his uninhibited fuck hole. In the end, they overwhelm not just their now horny and happy slave, but COVID-19, too!

Could COVID-19 stand up to the Bad Dragon Girls? Of course not! You’re out of your fucking mind!
title: BAD DRAGON GIRLS v. COVID-19: Part 2
